title: Trump calls for six Democrats to be tried for 'seditious behavior'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump wrote that a group of Democratic lawmakers who urged servicemembers to refuse illegal orders should be 'put on trial.'

title: Feds: NJ GOP congressman's ex-staffer lied about being attacked
shortDescription: An ex-aide to Rep. Jeff Van Drew is accused of lying when she told police she was a victim of a politically motivated assault in a NJ nature preserve.

title: Zohran Mamdani to meet Trump in DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirmed via Truth Social that he's meeting with NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani to discuss affordability and public safety.

title: Does 'protecting children' explain why MAGA rebuffed Trump on Epstein?
shortDescription: MAGA voters care passionately about protecting children from abuse. That might explain why Trump hasn't been able to stop the Epstein file release.

title: Trump and Mamdani to meet at the White House Friday. What to expect.
shortDescription: The president announced on his social media platform Truth Social that the pair would meet at the White House in the Oval Office on Nov. 21.

title: Trump signs bill to release Epstein files
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed the Jeffrey Epstein Transparency Act, directing the DOJ to release all files from the Epstein investigation.

title: Trump shakes up negotiations, shops new deal to end Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: Trump's dispatch of the Army's top official to Ukraine was cast by the administration as a fresh approach to ending the conflict.

title: 'Quiet piggy,' ABC News join long history of Trump sparring with media
shortDescription: President Trump told a Bloomberg reporter "quiet piggy" on a recent Air Force One trip. He also lashed out at ABC News' Mary Bruce in the Oval Office.

title: Ohio follows Trump's lead on mail-in ballots
shortDescription: The Ohio state House approved a Senate bill that would require mail-in ballots to arrive by Election Day to be counted.

title: Trump won't attend Dick Cheney's funeral
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will not attend former Republican Vice President Dick Cheney's funeral on Nov. 20, a White House official said.
